General.Name: Mega Manunggal Property TBK PT
General.Description: PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk engages in the real estate business in Indonesia. The company also involved in the leasing of warehouses and office spaces; and provision of consultation management services. PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia.
General.Address: Grha Intirub, Intirub Business Park, Jakarta Timur, Indonesia, 13650
